settings.title: 24H VOLUME in ETH
settings.value:
var vol = parseFloat(datasources["itbit-ticker-ethusd"]["volume24h"])

return (vol).toFixed(6).replace(/\d(?=(\d{3})+\.)/g, '$&,')

settings.title: 24H VOLUME
MID-PRICE
Spread
Slippages BUY 100k
Slippages SELL 100k
ORDER COUNT
settings.value:
var bids = datasources["itbit-orderbook-ethusd"]["bids"]
var asks = datasources["itbit-orderbook-ethusd"]["asks"]
return "B: "+bids.length+", A:"+asks.length
